Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor tests into separate files per admin command

- Split monolithic test/main.cpp into individual test files
- NVMeDeviceTest.cpp: lifecycle, move semantics, error handling \(11 tests\)
- IdentifyTest.cpp: Identify controller/namespace \(5 tests\)
- GetSetFeaturesTest.cpp: Get/Set Features \(8 tests\)
- GetLogPageTest.cpp: Get Log Page, SMART, Error logs \(7 tests\)
- FirmwareTest.cpp: Firmware download/commit \(8 tests\)
- NamespaceManagementTest.cpp: NS create/delete/attach/detach \(12 tests\)
- FormatNVMTest.cpp: Format NVM command \(6 tests\)
- SanitizeTest.cpp: Sanitize operations \(7 tests\)
- QueueManagementTest.cpp: IO queue create/delete \(14 tests\)
- MiscCommandsTest.cpp: DeviceSelfTest, Security, KeepAlive, Abort \(16 tests\)
- StructureSizeTest.cpp: CDW structure size verification \(13 tests\)

Total: 107 tests across 15 test suites

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
